MCP Server.PortBeschreibung: TCP port the MCP server listens on. MCP clients (e.g. Claude, other AI agents) connect to this port. Example: 4096.
MCP Server.SymconApiUrlBeschreibung: Base URL of the Symcon JSON-RPC API. If Symcon runs on the same box, e.g.: http://127.0.0.1:3777/api/
MCP Server.ActiveBeschreibung: When enabled, the MCP server starts when you click "Apply changes". Disabling or applying again stops it.
